column5: I am taking my own boat to this lodge and only recently found out they do not have docks. You pull your boat up on the "sand" when you dock. My question is will I scratch up my 2001 Lund or have you used your own boat and been ok with the sand method.Thanks

We were there in June. The sand method shouldn't hurt your boat any. They have added a dock for the camps boats and opened up the original dock for customers. It will dock approximately 6-8 boats.Good luck and write back and tell us how fishing was this time of the year.

Tom, We have been to Ojibway the last three Junes. Approximately the 10th of June. Fishing has been unbelievable every year. Approximately 30-50 fish per guy per day. You will love the fact that every bite could be a big one. E-mail me at [email protected]

Just returned from there. Four days of heaven!!!! Dockage is better than it has ever been and having the store right there is really nice. Hope you have a great time. Wish I wasn't here, but still there.....
